short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get comprehensive detail of profit/loss on each invested coin in Balances tab of www.koinex.com and also set price alerts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was made as a small personal project to set price alerts on prices of coin in www.Koinex.com, also to get the detailed stats of the investments , like  'average purchase price', 'profit or loss' of each invested coin. To get the alerts koinex need to be always open in a tab  , in next release plan is to remove this dependency. Share if you find it useful and also share feedback, I will try to improve it with time.
